title: cmd/gc: report unreachable code
body:
Hi

Because I am stupid from times to times when I update my code, I create some unreachable statements. Some languages like Java report such issues. The current compiler does not seem to do so. Is it on purpose or not ?

Attach is a classical double return. The second one can never be executed:
http://play.golang.org/p/1JvAR4Yari

BR
